# CTF:Crypto2

<br /><br />



<br />



======================================================

crypto 201<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------

```
#!/usr/bin/python2

c=150815
d = 1941
N = 435979

print pow(c,d,N)
```
<br />


======================================================

crypto 202-a<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------


```
p = 
q = 
e = 65537
c = 
```


```
#!/usr/bin/python2

import gmpy2
p = 
q = 
e = 65537
c = 
n=p*q
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=int(gmpy2.invert(e,phi))
print pow(c,d,n)

```

crypto 202<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------

```
p =  9648423029010515676590551740010426534945737639235739800643989352039852507298491399561035009163427050370107570733633350911691280297777160200625281665378483
q =  11874843837980297032092405848653656852760910154543380907650040190704283358909208578251063047732443992230647903887510065547947313543299303261986053486569407
e =  65537
c =  

Use RSA to find the secret message
```

```
#!/usr/bin/python2

import gmpy2

p =  9648423029010515676590551740010426534945737639235739800643989352039852507298491399561035009163427050370107570733633350911691280297777160200625281665378483
q =  11874843837980297032092405848653656852760910154543380907650040190704283358909208578251063047732443992230647903887510065547947313543299303261986053486569407
e =  65537
c =

n=p*q
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=int(gmpy2.invert(e,phi))
print pow(c,d,n)

```


<br />







======================================================

crypto 204<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------

```
I recovered an RSA encrypted message from the 1980's. can you decrypt it?

c = 29846947519214575162497413725060412546119233216851184246267357770082463030225
n = 70736025239265239976315088690174594021646654881626421461009089480870633400973
e = 3
```

利用[factordb](https://factordb.com/)

```
#!/usr/bin/python2

import gmpy2
n = 70736025239265239976315088690174594021646654881626421461009089480870633400973


p =  238324208831434331628131715304428889871
q =  296805874594538235115008173244022912163
e = 3
c =29846947519214575162497413725060412546119233216851184246267357770082463030225
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=int(gmpy2.invert(e,phi))
print pow(c,d,n)

```

然後轉成16進位在轉成字串<br />
~收工


<br />











======================================================

crypto 205<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------
MD5:
``
c8db257e50bc35bf721b11d333fe9fd6
``


直接線上解[https://crackstation.net/](https://crackstation.net/)

<br />





======================================================

crypto 208<br /><br />
------------------------------------------------------


```
c = 
n = 
e = 65537

```

一樣用factordb

```
#!/usr/bin/python2

import gmpy2
c = 
n = 
p=109961057082794132970023786643265702791435979806289615340686558814372581336844827811897743892137093567873243483114130489
9886705498243884638860011461262640420256594271701812607875254999146529955445651530660964259381322198377196122393
q=n/p
e = 65537
phi=(p-1)*(q-1)
d=int(gmpy2.invert(e,phi))
print pow(c,d,n)

```

一樣轉成16進位在轉成字串<br />
